 [*]You have less teeth than fingers.[*]You drink all day.[*]Your beard is down to your hip. (males)[*]Your wife/husband is your first cousin. (married people)[*]You believe in zombies.[*]When you swim in the ocean, whales sing "We are family!"

I say to be a redneck, you need these prerequisites:
 [*]You have less teeth than fingers.[*]You drink all day.[*]Your beard is down to your hip. (males)[*]Your wife/husband is your first cousin. (married people)[*]You believe in zombies.[*]When you swim in the ocean, whales sing "We are family!"

What is the source of pride in claiming to be a redneck? 
 
 What are the pro's in being a redneck?
NATO 556

A redneck is a person of generally conservative ideals who may or may not live in the country, and who may or may not like nascar. A redneck is also more likely to be of the opinion that family is more important than running a business, and more concerned with the liberal politically correct nonsense that schools insist on teaching over more important topics such as proper grammar and American history.
sinjin

...the liberal politically correct nonsense that schools insist on teaching over more important topics such as proper grammar and American history.
Care to be specific? Like? Where?
NATO 556

Care to be specific? Like? Where?

 
 Counseling, discussing of feelings, sex education in kindergarten, etc. all the puke that plays no vital role in the real world.
sinjin

Counseling, discussing of feelings, sex education in kindergarten, etc. all the puke that plays no vital role in the real world.
Please provide a link to a specific district where sex ed. is taught to kindergarteners. Counseling? What sort of counseling serves no purpose? Discussing feelings? The feelings of children are unimportant as it pertains to their school life and scholastic performance? Do you have any idea how many people out there are emotionally screwed up and passing it to the next generation? Please join us in the 21st century when you get a chance.

Please provide a link to a specific district where sex ed. is taught to kindergarteners.

 ABC News: Sex Ed for Kindergartners?
 
 
Counseling? What sort of counseling serves no purpose? Discussing feelings? The feelings of children are unimportant as it pertains to their school life and scholastic performance? Do you have any idea how many people out there are emotionally screwed up and passing it to the next generation? Please join us in the 21st century when you get a chance.

 
 Our parents and grandparents on a whole seemed to do just fine without having to discuss how it made them feel to not get their favorite chocolate pudding at lunch break.
Jo Bennett

Our ancestors fought numerous wars over the international diplomatic equivalent of not getting their favourite chocolate pudding. Being better able to discuss things might not be such a bad idea.
 
 And the sex ed for 5 year olds in Britain is not actually about sex at all, it's about relationships.
Penfold

........ Please join us in the 21st century when you get a chance.

 
 
 Maybe the 19th would be a more achieveable target. emoticon_rolleyes
NATO 556

Our ancestors fought numerous wars over the international diplomatic equivalent of not getting their favourite chocolate pudding. Being better able to discuss things might not be such a bad idea.

 
 That's a different matter entirely.
 
 
And the sex ed for 5 year olds in Britain is not actually about sex at all, it's about relationships.

 
 What do kindergarten students need to know about relationships? They're too young to even understand the concept of mathematical division.
Jo Bennett

Like most things you teach 5 year olds, it's a starting point from which to understand more complex things. And 5 year olds still have relationships, with friends, with family, with classmates. Understanding how to deal with falling out and how to talk to people is an important part of growing up.
snakespit

 After all, me being from Pennsylvania, I am a racist redneck clinging to guns and religion. I would like to take this opportunity to thank Murtha and Obama for clearly defining who I am. emoticon_rolleyes
